title: Fix ProfileSetupModal background to solid white/dark

requirements.summary: Update ProfileSetupModal to use a solid dark overlay (rgba(0,0,0,0.85) or bg-gray-900) and a solid white card background (#FFFFFF) with navy (#0A1F44) text, removing all transparency that causes underlying page content to show through.
acceptanceCriteria: The modal overlay behind the ProfileSetupModal card is fully opaque dark (no page content visible through it).
The modal card has a solid white (#FFFFFF) background â€” no transparency or blur effect.
All form labels (Full Name, Class, Contact Number), input fields, validation messages, and the Save & Continue button are clearly readable against the solid white card.
The modal appearance is consistent on both desktop and mobile viewports.
No underlying home page content bleeds through the modal card or its overlay.

file_operations.description: Replace any semi-transparent or translucent background styles on the modal overlay with a solid dark background (rgba(0,0,0,0.85) or bg-gray-900). Replace the modal card background with a solid white #FFFFFF background. Ensure all text (labels, inputs, validation messages) uses navy #0A1F44 for maximum readability against the white card. Remove any backdrop-blur, opacity, or transparency classes that allow underlying content to show through.
